main_title: HOW MUCH DOES IT COST TO RENT A PROPERTY IN BRUSSELS?
test_description: Whether you are a current or future tenant or landlord, this site will allow you to find out the indicative reference rent for the property you rent or plan to rent, taking into account its location and main characteristics.
info_box_text: The rent grid website has been updated to make the calculation of the reference rent more transparent.

CalculatorPage.regionalService: BRUSSELS REGIONAL PUBLIC SERVICE - BRUSSELS HOUSING
CalculatorPage.title: Indicative Rent Calculator
CalculatorPage.description: Estimate the reference rent for a property in Brussels based on its characteristics
CalculatorPage.footer: © 2023 Brussels Regional Public Service - Brussels Housing. All rights reserved.

PropertyTypeStep.title: What type of property do you want to rent?

PropertyDetailsStep.title: Property Characteristics
PropertyDetailsStep.description: Indicate the details of your property

EnergyStep.title: Energy and Heating
EnergyStep.demoModeAlert: Demo mode: Address data is not available. A default difficulty index will be used for the calculation.

AddressStep.title: Property Address
AddressStep.description: Enter the full address of the property in Brussels
AddressStep.demoModeAlert: Demo mode: Address data is not available. A default difficulty index will be used for the calculation.

initialInsertError.title: Error:
initialInsertError.message: Could not save the initial estimate. Please try again later. ({error})

ResultStep.title: Estimation Result
ResultStep.description: Here is the indicative rent for this property
ResultStep.priceRangeTooltip: According to Brussels legislation, the reference rent can vary by ±20%

actualRentSection.title: Confirm your current rent
actualRentSection.description: Help us improve our estimates and contact you if needed by sharing your current rent and contact details (optional).
actualRentSection.errorMessage: Error during update. Please check the amount and try again.

calculationMethod.title: Calculation Method
calculationMethod.description: The reference rent is calculated according to the official formula of the Brussels-Capital Region, which takes into account the type of property, its surface area, the number of bedrooms, the condition of the property, and the neighborhood difficulty index.

importantInfo.title: Important Information
importantInfo.description1: The reference rent is not binding. Outside of specific regulatory frameworks, the rent amount is freely determined by the landlord on the private market.
importantInfo.description2: However, the reference rent must be mentioned in addition to the actual rent in residential leases in the Brussels-Capital Region.

error.insufficientQuery: Please enter at least the street name
error.noResults: No address found. Please try another search.

AddressAutocomplete.demoModeAlert: Demo mode: Use the 'Enter manually' option to enter an address.

Metadata.title: Brussels Housing - How much does it cost to rent a property in Brussels?
Metadata.description: Brussels Regional Public Service - Brussels Housing. Estimate the indicative reference rent for a property in Brussels.

housingType.title: Housing Type
housingType.description: What type of housing do you live in or wish to live in?

privateMarket.title: Private Market
privateMarket.description: Direct rental with a private landlord

socialHousing.title: Social Housing
socialHousing.description: CPAS, SLSP or other public organizations

infoBox.title: Important Information
infoBox.description: Rent control in Brussels only applies to private market housing. Social housing and AIS have their own specific regulations.

housingType.alert: Rent control does not apply to AIS or social housing.

dataProtection.title: Your data is protected
dataProtection.description: This tool helps you evaluate whether your rent complies with legal regulations. All your data remains anonymous and confidential.
dataProtection.consent: I agree that my anonymized data may be used for research purposes to improve housing policies.
dataProtection.consentRequired: Please accept the use of data to continue

tenant.title: Tenant
tenant.description: I rent or wish to rent a property

landlord.title: Landlord
landlord.description: I rent out or wish to rent out my property

calculator.title: Evaluate your rent
calculator.description: Discover if your rent complies with Brussels legal framework

CalculatorRegionPage.title: Evaluate your rent
CalculatorRegionPage.description: In which region is your housing located?

activeFramework.title: Rent control in effect
activeFramework.description: In Brussels, rents are regulated by a legal reference grid. Our tool allows you to evaluate whether your rent complies with this grid.

dataProtection.title: Your data is protected
dataProtection.description: All information you provide remains anonymous and confidential. It will only be used to calculate your evaluation.

warning.title: Rent control not yet implemented
warning.description: Rent control is not yet in effect in Wallonia, but you can still evaluate your situation to prepare for future developments.
warning.note: This evaluation will give you an indication of the fairness of your rent according to standards under development.

inDevelopment.title: Tool under evaluation
inDevelopment.description: We are currently working on adapting our tool for the Flemish region. This functionality will be available soon.
inDevelopment.note: In the meantime, you can contact us for any questions regarding your rental situation.

hero.title: Contact us
hero.description: A question? Need help? Want to join us? We are here to support you.

assemblies.title: Local Assemblies
assemblies.schedule: Every first Tuesday of the month

form.title: Send us a message
form.description: Fill out the form below and we will respond as soon as possible.

message.label: Message *
message.placeholder: Describe your request, question or situation...

checkboxes.newsletter: I would like to receive the WUUNE newsletter
checkboxes.assembly: I would like to be informed about local assemblies

urgentInfo.title: Emergency situation?
urgentInfo.description: If you are in an emergency situation (threat of eviction, abusive rent, etc.), contact us directly by phone or email for priority response.

form.successMessage: Your message has been sent! We will respond as soon as possible.
form.privacyDisclaimer: By submitting this form, you agree that your data will be used to respond to your request. We are committed to respecting your privacy and will never share your information with third parties.

retrievedInfo.title: Detailed Questionnaire
retrievedInfo.description: We use the information already collected from your evaluation
retrievedInfo.infoMessage: This detailed questionnaire will allow us to better understand your situation and give you more precise advice. No data will be asked again!

personalSituation.title: Personal and lease situation
personalSituation.description: This information helps us better understand your situation
personalSituation.rentIndexation: Has your rent been indexed recently?

rentIndexation.yesOld: Yes, but more than a year ago

maintenance.boilerMaintenance: I perform annual boiler maintenance (if applicable)

problems.title: Potential housing problems
problems.description: These defects may justify a rent reduction
problems.warningMessage: The more defects your housing has, the more arguments you will have to negotiate a rent reduction.

positiveAspects.title: Positive aspects of housing
positiveAspects.description: These elements may justify a higher rent
positiveAspects.additionalCommentsPlaceholder: Describe other particular aspects of your housing...
positiveAspects.successMessage: This information will allow us to give you a complete and personalized evaluation.

personalizedResult.title: Your personalized situation
personalizedResult.description: Here is our evaluation based on your answers

wuune.title: Join Wuune!
wuune.description: Whatever the result, together we are stronger to defend your rights.

header.collectiveTitle: WUUNE COLLECTIVE - TOGETHER AGAINST ABUSIVE RENTS

hero.title: LOWER MY RENT
hero.subtitle: Together, let's fight against abusive rents!
hero.description: Join the Wuune collective and make your voice heard. Is your housing too expensive? Find out and take action!
hero.imageAlt: Warm people demonstrating for fair rents

aboutUs.title: Who are we?
aboutUs.description1: Wuune is a citizen collective engaged in the fight against abusive rents. We believe that housing is a fundamental right and that everyone deserves a roof at a fair price.
aboutUs.description2: Together, we mobilize to enforce tenant rights, raise public awareness, and bring our demands to the competent authorities.
aboutUs.imageAlt: Demonstration with warm and collective atmosphere

joinCampaign.title: Join our campaign
joinCampaign.description: Together, we can make a difference against abusive rents.

evaluateRent.title: Evaluate your rent
evaluateRent.description: Discover if your rent complies with legal grids in force.

contactUs.title: Contact us
contactUs.description: A question? Need help? We are here to support you.

footer.description: Citizen collective for fair rents in Brussels.
